arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur overcame Manchester United in the Europa League final in May, allowing them to end their 17-year wait to add to the trophy cabinet, but a lot has changed since then and those currently at Hotspur Way and Old Trafford are preparing to lock horns again in north London on Saturday.
